sample.nodes

Class DraggedBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.nodes.DraggedBehavior
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Behavior
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NodeBoxDraggable

    public abstract class DraggedBehavior
extends java.lang.Object
implements Behavior
    DraggedBehaviour class. This class deals with a generic implementation of mouse events, such as drag, press, enter...
    Version:
    v1.0
    Author:
    Daniel
